thread.title: A Guide to SXSW's Best Food-Focused Panels and Films
thread.title_full: A Guide to SXSW's Best Food-Focused Panels and Films

author: Elizabeth Leader Smith
title: A Guide to SXSW's Best Food-Focused Panels and Films
text: The Howard Theatre308 North Main Street, Taylor Join in for a special screening of the feature documentary Barbecue followed by Q&A and brisket at Louie Mueller Barbecue in Taylor. See the film in one of the towns that inspired it, hear pitmaster Wayne Mueller and the filmmakers talk barbecue across twelve countries, and taste some of Louie Mueller's finest. Tickets are available for bus, film and barbecue ($40), or just the film and barbecue ($25). Tickets here . Bus departs outside Hilton Hotel in Austin at 1:45 p.m. sharp. Limited tickets available on the bus and at the door.
